name: agent-run
description: Execute an automation agent registered in .cursor/agents/registry.json. Usage: agent-run agent=<name> args="--dry-run"
command:
bash -lc '
set -euo pipefail
AGENT="${agent:-}" || true
ARGS="${args:-}"
if [ -z "$AGENT" ]; then
  echo "agent parameter is required (agent=<name>)" >&2
  exit 2
fi
cd /Users/freqkflag/Projects/GitHub/infra
if [ -n "$ARGS" ]; then
  # shellcheck disable=SC2086
  set -- $ARGS
  python3 scripts/agents/run-agent.py run "$AGENT" -- "$@"
else
  python3 scripts/agents/run-agent.py run "$AGENT"
fi
'
